title: Ginko - Greenhouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Fusion
description: Little sister of Ginko which is also in the heart of Graz. Everything is vegan with the exception of cow milk as an option. Food includes fresh bowls, daily changing specials, soups, fresh pressed juices, smoothies, salads, breakfast, fair trade organic coffee and in-house-made cakes. Has lots of seating. Cozy interior with lots of plants, vintage couches; all with a Scandinavian touch. Located off the main street in a little passage.
